Articles.Content:
Watched a few videos on youtube and realised that when landing on the moon, I cast no shadow\'s.

Is there a mod I have to get, or is it a glitch???

It could be that your video card isn\'t able to render the shadow along with the terrain and craft.

That\'s just off the top of my head.

Also... are you running demo or latest KSP version?

The bug has been reported and discussed in This Thread. It may help the devs if you were to give your PC info over there.

To avoid having multiple threads discussing the same issue I\'m locking this thread.
